overview.heading: Grandville Virtual Office
overview.body: Secure a distinguished Grandville business address without the high costs of a traditional office. Opus VO enables you to anchor your business in Grandville’s dynamic ecosystem while being fiscally responsible. Need to host an impactful meeting or vital presentation? Our cutting-edge conference rooms have got you covered.  When you choose a virtual office in Grandville through Opus VO, a specialized live receptionist comes as part of your package. We handle every client interaction with the professionalism that aligns with your brand, allowing you to focus on your business goals. Delegate your day-to-day administrative tasks to us and concentrate on what you do best.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Grandville, Michigan even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Grandville. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Michigan.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Grandville virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Grandville?
sections.body: Grandville is not just about scenic beauty; it’s an emerging center for various industries from retail to technology. Having a Grandville address provides you with the opportunity to network with influential people and partake in events that could elevate your business.  Choosing Opus VO in Grandville isn’t just a cost-effective decision—it’s a strategic one. Are you set to advance your business to the next level? Our exceptional virtual office services are here to assist you.  Opus VO Grandville @ 4370 Chicago Dr. SW, Grandville, MI 49418
